resources.string: Scheduled warning: The charger is plugged.
Toggle to switch scheduled warning on/off
Warning will sound with this ring tone
This app will play a tone if the charger is plugged at a specified time. You will need to enable the warning on the next screen.

This app has three major functions:
* Battery temperature warning: Plays a tone if the charger is plugged at a specified time. The intention is to check for example at bed time, to avoid charging the device during night.
* Scheduled time warning: Plays a tone if the battery temperature gets too high.
* Fully charged warning: Plays a tone when the battery gets fully charged, so you don\'t charge longer than needed

With the settings, you are able to:

* Enable/disable the warnings
* Set time for the scheduled warning.
* Decide which tone to play
* Set the tone\'s sound volume
* Decide if the tone should be played at even if device is muted
Allow tone to be played, also if device is muted
Send an email to the support department if you have questions, or would like to report a problem. The address is: smallscore201@gmail.com
Toggle to get a warning if battery temperature gets high during charging
Temperature warning plays at this battery temperature
By clicking ok, you accept to use the app as is, and will not hold its developer responsible for possible malfunctions.
Toggle to get a warning when battery gets fully charged
